tool_description: Simple server convert longitude&latitude to timezone name
name: tzf
title: tzf

api_list.name: TZFService_GetTimezones
api_list.description: GetTimezones returns timezone names by longitude and latitude.

api_list.name: TZFService_GetAllTimezones
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tzf.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/tzs/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tzf.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: TZFService_GetTimezone
api_list.description: GetTimezone returns timezone name by longitude and latitude.
